  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_403</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_403</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Estudio gráfico de características globales de una función</string>
            <string language="en">Graphical study of the global features of a function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Graphische Studie der globalen Merkmale einer 
Funktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étude graphique des dispositifs globaux d'une 
fonction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudo gráfico das características globais de 
uma função</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studio grafico sulle caratteristiche globali di 
una funzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραφική μελέτη των σφαιρικών χαρακτηριστικών 
γνωρισμάτων μιας λειτουργίας</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el estudio de las propiedades globales de la gráfica de una función. Se estudia la continuidad, dominio e imagen, periodicidad y simetrías.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the global features of the graph of a function, such as continuity, domain and image, periodicity and symmetries.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">periodicidad</string>
            <string language="en">periodicity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">variación</string>
            <string language="en">variation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">simetrías</string>
            <string language="en">symmetries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graphs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">imagen</string>
            <string language="en">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">dominio</string>
            <string language="en">domain</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die globalen Merkmale des Diagramms einer Funktion, wie 
Durchgang, Gebiet und Bild, Periodizität und Symmetrie zu studieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier les dispositifs globaux du graphique d'une 
fonction, telle que la continuité, le domaine et l'image, la 
périodicité et les symétries.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
as características globais do gráfico de uma função, tal como a 
continuidade, o domínio e a imagem, o periodicity e as simetrias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare le caratteristiche globali del grafico di una funzione, quali
continuità, settore ed immagine, periodicità e simmetria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει τα σφαιρικά χαρακτηριστικά γνωρίσματα της 
γραφικής παράστασης μιας λειτουργίας, όπως η συνοχή, η δικτυακή 
γειτονιά και η εικόνα, η περιοδικότητα και οι συμμετρίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Periodizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Variante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Symmetrie</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
